moves.1. e4: standard white opening nothing Fancy here (i'm black by the way)
moves.2. f3 Be7: the start of the king side castle
moves.5... Nc6 6. Bxf6: He takes my knight taking out a potential future threat
moves.6... Bxf6: in return i take his bishop
moves.9... Nf4: put my knight right back into the fray of things
moves.11... Bxh4+: think i will put him in check instead :)  (better late than never)
moves.12... Qf6 13. Nf2: trying to keep his knight alive maybe?
moves.13... Bxf2: i take the knight of course losing an active bishop
moves.14. Qxf2: of course he takes the bishop
moves.15... h6: standard move on my part to stop mate
moves.19... bxc3: i take his pawn (i decide not to take his queen, surely he will move his queen and lose the knight)
moves.20. Rc1: where is he going with that move?
moves.20... cxd2: of course i take his knight, he resigned at this point (being down this far and losing either his queen or rook on the next move would be too much for anyone)
